mapper.select:
SELECT PM.id, PM.lastUpdateDate, PM.lastUpdateUserId, PM.readDate, PM.type, PM.userId, PM.userType, PM.vcid, PM.title, PM.createDate, PM.createUserId, PM.senderUsername, PM.senderUserId, PM.senderUserType, PM.unread, PM.content, PM.username FROM MSG_PRIVATE_MESSAGE PM WHERE
AND PM.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSG_PRIVATE_MESSAGE ( id, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateUserId, readDate, type, userId, userType, vcid, title, createDate, createUserId, senderUsername, senderUserId, senderUserType, unread, content, username ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{readDate}, #{type}, #{userId}, #{userType}, #{vcid}, #{title}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId}, #{senderUsername}, #{senderUserId}, #{senderUserType}, #{unread}, #{content}, #{username} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM MSG_PRIVATE_MESSAGE WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE MSG_PRIVATE_MESSAGE
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateUserId = #{lastUpdateUserId,javaType=java.lang.String},
readDate = #{readDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
type = #{type,javaType=com.tx.local.message.model.PrivateMessageTypeEnum},
vcid = #{vcid,javaType=java.lang.String},
title = #{title,javaType=java.lang.String},
unread = #{unread,javaType=boolean},
content = #{content,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
